snippet.title: A Wild Encounter! | Battle Gem Ponies Gameplay
snippet.description:
Check Out BGP for Yourself: https://linktr.ee/YotesMark

Some gameplay to show off improvements since remaking the 2017 build from scratch. Seen here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZQB1fOum4vw 

The Kickstarter really helped us out a lot and hopefully we'll finally see release day come Holiday 2023.
